**Request for Proposal - Cybersecurity Hardening Services**
===========================================================

**Issuing Agency:** Farm Credit Canada (FCC)

**Reference Number:** MX-42885644560

**Publication Date:** October 5, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** November 10, 2023, 2:00 PM CST

**Purpose:**
FCC, a financial Crown corporation, is seeking a qualified provider to deliver cybersecurity hardening services. The successful applicant will work closely with FCC to strengthen its cybersecurity posture, providing threat intelligence, monitoring, and response services.

**Scope of Work:**
The services provided will include:

* Threat hunting and intelligence
* Red teaming exercises
* Social engineering testing, including phishing, smishing, and vishing
* Network, application, and infrastructure vulnerability assessments and penetration testing
* Knowledge transfer, mentoring, and guidance on cybersecurity best practices

**RFP Requirements:**
* Respondents must have a comprehensive understanding of cybersecurity threats and vulnerabilities
* Ability to provide real-time monitoring and alert services
* Excellent communication and project management skills
* Alignment with FCC's values and policies

**Timeline:**
* RFP release date: October 5, 2023
* Questions accepted until: October 18, 2023, 2:00 PM CST
* FCC response to questions: October 31, 2023, 5:00 PM CST
* Tender closing date: November 10, 2023, 2:00 PM CST

**Note:** All times are in Central Standard Time (CST). Dates are subject to change at the discretion of FCC. Any changes will be communicated to respondents via amendments on MERX.

**Important Details:**
* This opportunity is covered under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* FCC is subject to the Official Languages Act (Canada) and respondents may respond in either English or French
* This is a non-binding, competitive RFP, and FCC reserves the right to cancel at any time

**Submission Requirements:**
* Responses must be submitted electronically through MERX on or before the tender closing date
* Proposals exceeding the maximum number of pages will be disqualified

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact Dhruv Bhatt, Procurement Manager at [procurement@fcc-fac.ca](mailto:procurement@fcc-fac.ca) or 000-000-0000.
